title: aDugu varamula
sahitya:
aDugu varamula niccedanu  
(aDugu)

anupallavi

aDugaDuguku ninnE dalacu cunnAnu adbhutamaina bhaktiki
sokkinAnu  
(aDugu)

caraNam 1

dhana kanakamulu ennaina nIku dAraputrulu sogasaina yindla
canuvuna nosagudu-samshayamEla tanuvu cikkaganEla
dAnavabAla  
(aDugu)

caraNam 2

akrama danujula goTTi nI  yApadalanu dalameTTi
vikramamuna
bahu vikhyAtigA  vidhi  shakrAdula baTTamula
nosagedanu  
(aDugu)

caraNam 3

vAji gajAndolikamulu nIku  varamaina maNi
bhUSanamulu rAjiga
nosagaka rava tAlal nu  vara tyAgarAjAptuda nEnu
(aDugu)
